summary: Applies a configurable motion blur filter to 5‑D tensors representing 3‑D volumes, allowing control over kernel size, 3‑axis rotation, forward/backward direction, padding strategy, and interpolation method, and returns a tensor of the same shape.
business_intent: Enables realistic motion‑blur augmentation or preprocessing of volumetric data such as medical scans or video frames to improve model robustness and simulate acquisition artifacts.
